Method Detail

getInput

public int getInput(int type)
             throws OperationCancelledException,
                    OperationFailedException
Method used to gather input from a user that meets the required validation criteria for the specified input type.

Parameters:
type - The type of input to be taken.
Returns:
The validated input provided by the user.
Throws:
OperationCancelledException - Indication that the operation was cancelled by the user.
OperationFailedException - Indication that the operation failed at some stage.
